title: What actually happens in treatment when you get treated by a naturopath?
description: Answer (1 of 2): You stand the risk of having a serious medical condition misdiagnosed by some quack that couldn't handle getting an MD like a proper doctor. The treatment you get will, if you're lucky, be ineffective. If you're unlucky then it will be downright harmful. Here's the real gen from...
